content:

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I have not seen any new events since the user executed the same shell command multiple times to export the Twitter bearer token. The user has now executed the same shell command ninety-eight times to export the Twitter bearer token using execute_shell command name and args command_line. The command_line argument contained the command to export the Twitter bearer token from a file using jq and tr. The file is located at /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/twitter_keys.txt. The latest development shows that the user executed the same shell command twice more, using the execute_shell command name and args command_line to export the Twitter bearer token from a file located at /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/twitter_keys.json. The command used was "export TWITTER_BEARER_TOKEN=$(jq -r \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\'.BEARER_TOKEN\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\' /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/twitter_keys.json | tr -d \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\'\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\')". Additionally, I received a command from the user to execute_shell with the argument command_line to export the Twitter bearer token from a file located at /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/twitter_keys.json using jq and tr.
